mapper.select: select userNum , userId , userName, userStatus from User where userId = #{userId} and userPw = #{userPw}
select userNum, userId, userPw, userName, userAddress, userHp from User where userNum = #{userNum}

select u.userNum, lp.likedProductNum, p.productName, pd.productNum, pd.productPrice, pi.imageSavedName, pi.imagePrimary from User u, likedProduct lp, Product p, ProductDetail pd, productImage pi where u.userNum = lp.userNum and lp.productDetailNum = pd.productDetailNum and p.productNum = pd.productNum and pd.productDetailNum = pi.productDetailNum and u.userNum =#{userNum} and pi.imagePrimary = 1 limit 3

select u.userNum, p.productName, pd.productNum, pd.productPrice, pi.imageSavedName, h.productCount, r.totalPrice, r.receiptNum, st.storageSize from User u, Product p, ProductDetail pd, productImage pi, History h, Receipt r, Storage st where u.userNum = r.userNum and p.productNum = pd.productNum and pd.productDetailNum = pi.productDetailNum and pd.storageNum = st.storageNum and h.productDetailNum = pd.productDetailNum and r.receiptNum = h.receiptNum and u.userNum =#{userNum} AND r.receiptNum = ( SELECT MAX(receiptNum) FROM Receipt WHERE userNum = r.userNum ) and pi.imagePrimary = 1 limit 3;

select u.userNum, u.userName, u.userId, r.receiptNum, r.purchasedDate, r.totalPrice, h.productDetailNum, h.productCount, pd.productNum, pd.productPrice, p.productName, c.colorName, pi.imageSavedName, st.storageSize from User u, Receipt r, History h, ProductDetail pd, Product p, Color c, productImage pi, Storage st where u.userNum = r.userNum and r.receiptNum = h.receiptNum and h.productDetailNum = pd.productDetailNum and pd.productNum = p.productNum and p.productNum = c.productNum and pd.colorNum = c.colorNum and pd.productDetailNum = pi.productDetailNum and pd.storageNum = st.storageNum AND r.receiptNum = ( SELECT MAX(receiptNum) FROM Receipt WHERE userNum = r.userNum ) and pi.imagePrimary = 1 and u.userNum =#{userNum}
select userNum, userId, userName from User where userNum = #{userNum}
